item.title: Even Govinda’s kids ignore his advice; negative influence ruined his bond with David Dhawan, says Sunita Ahuja: ‘He’s stuck in the 90s’ - The Indian Express
item.description:
Even Govinda’s kids ignore his advice; negative influence ruined his bond with David Dhawan, says Sunita Ahuja: ‘He’s stuck in the 90s’

Date: December 4, 2024

Source: The Indian Express

Govinda, once a top actor of the 90s, faces challenges in his relationship with filmmaker David Dhawan, according to his wife Sunita Ahuja. She attributes the strain to negative influences around Govinda and highlights the disconnect between his outdated advice and current industry trends.

  • Govinda and David Dhawan collaborated on 18 films, resulting in several iconic movies.
  • Sunita Ahuja claims that jealousy among peers led to tension in Govinda's relationship with David.
  • David advised Govinda to adapt to changing film dynamics, suggesting second-lead roles.
  • Sunita notes that their son Yashvardan Ahuja does not take Govinda's outmoded career advice seriously.
  • Sunita expresses mixed feelings about Govinda's announcement of his comeback.
“Nobody listens to Govinda’s advice because it’s stuck in the 90s. I give advice suited to 2024.” - Sunita Ahuja

This situation highlights how personal relationships and professional decisions can be influenced by external pressures and societal changes.

item.title: Allu Arjun to visit Sri Tej at KIMS Hospital this morning - 123telugu
item.description:
Allu Arjun to Visit Sri Tej at KIMS Hospital

Published on Jan 7, 2025 | Source: 123Telugu

Tollywood actor Allu Arjun, who achieved massive success with Pushpa 2, will visit Sri Tej, a nine-year-old boy injured during the movie's premiere.

  • Allu Arjun plans to visit KIMS Hospital in Hyderabad.
  • Sri Tej was injured at the Sandhya Theatre during the premiere on December 4, 2024.
  • The meeting is scheduled for after 10 AM, with prior police authorization obtained.
  • Allu Arjun aims to inquire about Sri Tej's recovery.
“Stay tuned for further updates.”

The visit highlights the actor's concern for the young fan and emphasizes the importance of safety at public events.

item.title: Ben Affleck and Jennifer Lopez reach settlement; to finalise divorce on February 20 - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Ben Affleck and Jennifer Lopez reach settlement; to finalise divorce on February 20

Published on: February 2024
Source: Times of India

Ben Affleck and Jennifer Lopez have reached a settlement in their divorce, seeking the court's finalization of their breakup on February 20.

  • The couple finalized their divorce through mediation.
  • Both will retain individually acquired assets.
  • No spousal support payments will be made by either party.
  • Lopez will revert to her maiden name.
  • They have agreed on their $61 million home, currently on the market.
  • The couple had no children together.
“The couple said in court filings that they were separated in April 2023, just 9 months after their grand wedding.”

The legal split will be formalized on February 20, marking a swift resolution to their marriage less than two years after they tied the knot.

item.title: Who Is Ridhima Pandit? Bollywood Actresses Linked With Indian Cricketer Shubman Gill - In Pics - Zee News
item.description:
Who Is Ridhima Pandit? Bollywood Actresses Linked With Indian Cricketer Shubman Gill - In Pics

Date: Recently

Source: Zee News

Ridhima Pandit, known for her work in Indian television, has been linked with cricketer Shubman Gill, leading to rumors of a potential marriage, which she has publicly denied.

  • Ridhima Pandit rose to fame with her role in 'Bahu Hamari Rajni Kant'.
  • She addressed rumors linking her with cricketer Shubman Gill as false and baseless.
  • Pandit expressed concern over the impact of such rumors on her family.
  • She highlighted the role of social media in amplifying these false narratives.
  • Despite the rumors, she continues to focus on her acting career, including an upcoming film in 2024.
Ridhima stated, "I have never even met Shubman Gill; these rumors are a strange fabrication."

Pandit's experience illustrates the challenges of maintaining privacy and truth in the digital age, particularly in the public eye.

item.title: Kajal Aggarwal and Akshay Kumar pair up once again for this special film - 123telugu
item.description:
Kajal Aggarwal and Akshay Kumar Team Up Again for Special Film 'Kannappa'

Published on Jan 7, 2025 7:50 am IST

Bollywood star Akshay Kumar will soon be seen in the film Sky Force, releasing during the Republic Day weekend. Following this, he will make his Telugu debut in Vishnu Manchu’s film 'Kannappa', set to release in April 2025.

  • Akshay Kumar plays Lord Shiva in the film 'Kannappa'.
  • Kajal Aggarwal portrays Goddess Parvathi.
  • This is their second collaboration after the hit film 'Special 26'.
  • The cast includes Mohanlal, Sarathkumar, Mohan Babu, and others.
  • Mukesh Kumar Singh is directing the film, with Mohan Babu producing it.
“Initially, there were speculations about Prabhas portraying Lord Shiva, but it has been confirmed that Akshay is taking on the role.”

This film marks a significant collaboration in Akshay Kumar's expanding career into Telugu cinema.

item.title: Sana Khan and husband Anas Saiyad welcome their second child, a baby boy: ‘We're overjoyed to share the beautiful news’ - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Sana Khan and Anas Saiyad welcome their second child, a baby boy

Date: January 07, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Actor Sana Khan and her husband, Anas Saiyad, announced the arrival of their second child, a baby boy, born on January 5. They shared their joy on Instagram, expressing their happiness over the new addition to their family.

  • Sana and Anas welcomed their second son just nine months after the birth of their first child, Tariq Jamil.
  • The couple announced the birth with a heartfelt post, thanking Allah for the blessing of their new child.
  • They have not yet revealed the name or face of the baby.
  • Sana shared a message of gratitude and prayers for their children in her announcement.

“O Allah, all praise is yours. Bless us to raise him with kindness and righteousness, and make him among your faithful servants. We are overjoyed to share the beautiful news of the arrival of our little prince!”

This joyful occasion adds to Sana and Anas's growing family, reflecting their hopes and aspirations for their children.

item.title: Tom Holland And Zendaya Are Engaged! Spider-Man Couple Exchanged Rings In An Intimate Ceremony - News18
item.description:
Tom Holland And Zendaya Are Engaged! Spider-Man Couple Exchanged Rings In An Intimate Ceremony

Date: January 07, 2025

Source: News18

Tom Holland and Zendaya are finally engaged. As reported by TMZ, the Spider-Man stars exchanged rings recently in an intimate ceremony that did not involve their family members.

  • The couple was spotted with a large diamond ring at the 82nd Golden Globes.
  • Zendaya responded coyly when asked about the ring during the event.
  • They have been together since 2021 and keep their relationship private.
  • Both actors will appear together in the upcoming film, The Odyssey.
“Parts of my life, I accept, are going to be public... It’s about protecting the peace and letting things be your own,” said Zendaya.

This engagement marks a significant milestone for the beloved couple, who have often been in the public eye since their roles in the Spider-Man franchise.

item.title: Aubrey Plaza calls husband Jeff Baena's suicide an 'unimaginable tragedy' - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Aubrey Plaza Calls Husband Jeff Baena's Suicide an 'Unimaginable Tragedy'

Date: January 6, 2023 | Source: Times of India

Aubrey Plaza, the actress known for her role in 'Parks and Recreation', has expressed her grief publicly following the tragic death of her husband, Jeff Baena, who died by suicide at the age of 47.

  • Plaza and Baena's families released a statement describing his death as an 'unimaginable tragedy' and thanked supporters for their kindness.
  • The couple, who began dating in 2001, married in May 2021.
  • Baena was an independent filmmaker and had collaborated with Plaza on multiple projects.
  • His death led Plaza to withdraw from presenting duties at the 82nd Golden Globes, where the couple was acknowledged with tributes from the industry.
  • Baena's legacy includes directing Plaza in 'The Little Hours' and co-writing films like 'I Heart Huckabees'.
“This is an unimaginable tragedy. We are deeply grateful to everyone who has offered support. Please respect our privacy during this time.”

The loss of Jeff Baena has profoundly affected Aubrey Plaza, and she requests respect for their family's privacy as they navigate this difficult time.

item.title: Pushpa 2 box office collection Day 33: Allu Arjun starrer enters sees 65% drop on 5th Monday; film become - TOI Etimes
item.description:
Pushpa 2 box office collection Day 33: Allu Arjun starrer enters sees 65% drop on 5th Monday; film becomes biggest Hindi blockbuster as it enters Rs 800 crore club

Publication Date: Recent
Source: Unspecified

On its 33rd day of release, 'Pushpa 2' has reached a significant milestone, marking itself as the biggest Hindi blockbuster by crossing the Rs 800 crore mark, despite experiencing a 65% drop in box office collections on its fifth Monday.

  • The film, featuring Allu Arjun, has become a massive hit, particularly among Hindi-speaking audiences.
  • The substantial drop in revenue highlights the typical trend in box office collections after an initial surge.
  • This achievement reflects the film's strong appeal and marketing strategies.
“'Pushpa 2' has taken the box office by storm, becoming a cultural phenomenon.”

In conclusion, 'Pushpa 2' has not only achieved remarkable financial success but has also established itself as a significant player in the Hindi film market, paving the way for future regional films to achieve similar feats.

item.title: WWE Raw Results – 1/6/25 (Massive Netflix debut, Punk vs. Rollins, Reigns vs. Sikoa, Ripley vs. Morgan, John Cena Retirement Tour starts) - Wrestleview.com
item.description:
WWE Raw Results - Netflix Debut

Date: January 6, 2025 | Source: Wrestleview.com

WWE Raw officially kicks off its new streaming era on Netflix after over 30 years on traditional TV, introducing a fresh experience for fans worldwide.

  • CM Punk faced Seth “Freakin” Rollins in a long-awaited match.
  • Women’s World Champion Liv Morgan defended her title against Rhea Ripley.
  • Roman Reigns took on Solo Sikoa in a Tribal Combat match.
  • John Cena kicked off his Retirement Tour.
  • Heavy promotion included a cameo by The Rock, who received a massive ovation.
“Absolutely incredible work by WWE to make that opening for #RawOnNetflix as big as possible.” — Wrestleview.com

The event signifies a bold new chapter for WWE as it embraces a streaming platform, elevating how wrestling is presented to a global audience.

item.title: Sagittarius, Daily Horoscope Today, January 7, 2025: Favorable for purchases related to home or property - The Times of India
item.description:
Sagittarius, Daily Horoscope Today, January 7, 2025: Favorable for purchases related to home or property

Date: January 7, 2025 | Source: Astrology Daily

Today's horoscope suggests a favorable day for Sagittarius natives, particularly for making purchases related to home or property.

  • Good day for buying real estate or home-related items.
  • Increased opportunities in personal and financial matters.
  • Encouragement to invest in long-term assets.
“Today is a great day to make moves in securing your dream home or revamping your living space.”

Overall, Sagittarius individuals should seize the day for real estate opportunities and focus on building a comfortable home environment.

item.title: Game Changer: 2 Fans Die After Attending Ram Charan Film's Pre-Release Event; Dil Raju Offers Rs10-Lakh Aid - News18
item.description:
Game Changer: 2 Fans Die After Attending Ram Charan Film's Pre-Release Event; Dil Raju Offers Rs10-Lakh Aid

Date: January 06, 2025 Source: News18

Two Ram Charan fans tragically lost their lives following the pre-release event of the film Game Changer in Rajahmundry.

  • The victims, Arava Manikanta (23) and Thokada Charan (22), were returning home when they were involved in a fatal accident.
  • Dil Raju, the film's producer, has offered financial support of Rs 10 lakh to the families of the deceased.
  • The incident has sparked discussions about safety following major film events, especially after a similar tragedy occurred last month.
“I pray that their souls rest in peace, and we will stand by and support the two families.” - Dil Raju

This incident raises important questions about the safety protocols in place at large public gatherings, especially in the film industry.

item.title: Aquarius Daily Horoscope Today, Jan 07, 2025 predicts expanding business - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Aquarius Daily Horoscope for January 07, 2025

Published on: Jan 07, 2025 04:10 AM IST

Source: Hindustan Times

Today, your romantic relationship will be stronger. Professional success will bring satisfaction, while minor financial issues may require careful expense management.

  • Your love life flourishes; partners will be supportive in both personal and professional matters.
  • Professional growth is expected, with success in tasks despite workplace challenges.
  • Financial prosperity is indicated; opportunities for investment and repayment of dues arise.
  • No major health issues reported, but seniors should monitor breath-related concerns.
“Today, you are blessed with love and the partner will be a pillar in both personal and professional endeavors.”

The predictions for Aquarius suggest a positive day filled with love, career growth, and financial opportunities.

item.title: Sagittarius Daily Horoscope Today, Jan 07, 2025 predicts success at the workplace - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Sagittarius Daily Horoscope Today, January 07, 2025 predicts success at the workplace

Date: January 07, 2025
Source: Hindustan Times

Today's horoscope for Sagittarius emphasizes successful professional endeavors and personal expression in love. The forecast highlights stability in health and finances, alongside a crucial need for communication in romantic relationships.

  • Express feelings freely in your love life.
  • Professional success will enhance your financial status.
  • Maintain composure during stress at home.
  • Control spending and focus on a healthy lifestyle.

Sagittarius Love Horoscope Today

Communication is key; express emotions and support your partner's achievements.

Sagittarius Career Horoscope Today

Success at the workplace is imminent; those seeking new jobs should take action.

Sagittarius Money Horoscope Today

Prosperity is on the horizon; past investments yield good returns.

Sagittarius Health Horoscope Today

Be cautious of cough-related issues and ensure medication compliance.

“Your communication is a key factor in romance today.”

This horoscope encourages Sagittarius individuals to embrace their strengths and communicate openly, predicting a positive and fruitful day ahead.

item.title: Scorpio Daily Horoscope Today, Jan 07, 2025 predicts planning big investments - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Scorpio Daily Horoscope Today, January 07, 2025

Date: Jan 07, 2025 Source: Hindustan Times

Today's horoscope suggests that Scorpios should plan big investments and maintain a productive mindset while overcoming professional challenges.

  • Trust your instincts and commit to your relationships.
  • Minor turbulence may arise due to past love affairs.
  • Career prospects include job interviews and potential relocations.

item.description:
Libra Daily Horoscope Today, January 07, 2025

Today, Libras can expect positive outcomes in various areas of their lives, especially regarding finances and relationships.

item.description:
Taurus Daily Horoscope Today, January 07, 2025 predicts the best love life

Date: January 07, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

This daily horoscope for Taurus suggests a positive day for love and health, despite minor professional challenges.

  • No major impact from professional challenges on the day.
  • Positive finance and health predictions.
  • Encouragement to be creative in romance, including surprise gifts.

item.title: Azaad Trailer Launch: Ajay Devgn On His Bond With Nephew Aaman Devgan: ‘Woh Mere Bete Jaisa Nahi…’ - News18
item.description:
Azaad Trailer Launch: Ajay Devgn On His Bond With Nephew Aaman Devgan: ‘Woh Mere Bete Jaisa Nahi…’

Date: January 06, 2025 | Source: News18

During the launch of the trailer for 'Azaad', Ajay Devgn spoke about his close relationship with his nephew Aaman Devgan, emphasizing that he considers Aaman as his own son. The film marks the acting debut of both Aaman and Raveena Tandon’s daughter, Rasha Thadani.

  • Ajay Devgn expressed that 'Azaad' is incredibly special to him.
  • The film features the debut of Aaman Devgan and Rasha Thadani.
  • Ajay praised the talents of both newcomers and the direction of Abhishek Kapoor.
  • 'Azaad' is set in pre-independence India, featuring a gripping narrative involving themes of bravery and family.
“Ye film mere liye kaafi maaino me special hai... Aaman, jo mere bete jaisa nahi, but beta hai.”

Azaad is directed by Abhishek Kapoor and is scheduled to release in theatres on January 17, 2025.

item.title: Career Horoscope Today for January 07, 2025: Astro tips for better the outcome - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Career Horoscope Today for January 07, 2025: Astro Tips for Better the Outcome

Date: January 07, 2025 • Source: Hindustan Times

Today's horoscope offers valuable insights for each zodiac sign, guiding individuals on how to navigate their careers effectively.

  • Aries: A special assignment will challenge your abilities; embrace it.
  • Taurus: Investing time in tasks leads to recognition and opportunities.
  • Gemini: Leadership and teamwork are crucial for success today.
  • Cancer: Use your communication skills to inspire and help your team.
  • Leo: Diversifying your tasks will improve your career outcomes.
  • Virgo: Set clear goals for better productivity; acquire new skills.
  • Libra: You will be rewarded for hard work from unexpected sources.
  • Scorpio: Seize opportunities that can lead to progress in your career.
  • Sagittarius: Adapt strategies to overcome workplace challenges.
  • Capricorn: Stay focused on work for positive results.
  • Aquarius: New opportunities for growth will arise today.
  • Pisces: Use this transition period to outline your life goals.

“Your abilities will lead you to a new and exciting opportunity.” - Neeraj Dhankher, Vedic Astrologer

Overall, today is a day to embrace challenges and seize opportunities for career advancement.

item.title: Naga Vamsi clears the air on the Boney Kapoor issue - 123telugu
item.description:
Naga Vamsi clears the air on the Boney Kapoor issue

Published on Jan 7, 2025 3:00 am IST

Naga Vamsi has made headlines after his comments regarding Pushpa 2 went viral, prompting significant trolling and prompting him to clarify his statements.

  • Naga Vamsi praised the success of Pushpa 2, which he claims has affected the Bollywood fraternity.
  • His remarks came in response to comments from producer Boney Kapoor, causing a misunderstanding that led to trolling.
  • Vamsi emphasized that he did not intend to offend anyone, particularly not Boney Kapoor, whom he considers a legendary producer.
  • After the interview, Vamsi reported that he and Boney discussed various important matters that were overlooked by media.
“I am being trolled a lot, and I want to clarify that I did not intend to offend anyone. These trolls exist only online.” - Naga Vamsi

In conclusion, Naga Vamsi aims to clear up any misconceptions from his earlier comments and highlights the importance of dialogue over online trolling.

item.title: Blake Lively, Justin Baldoni Feud Explained; Hollywood Has A History Of Celebrity Fights And Lawsuits - News18
item.description:
Blake Lively and Justin Baldoni's Legal Feud: A Hollywood Drama Unfolds

Date: January 06, 2025

Source: News18

Blake Lively has accused Justin Baldoni of launching a smear campaign against her during the filming of 'It Ends with Us'. Baldoni plans to countersue her after she alleged sexual harassment and privacy invasion.

  • Blake Lively's allegations include fat-shaming and a smear campaign by Baldoni.
  • Baldoni's lawyer stated he is ready to publish text messages to defend his client.
  • Lively's complaint claims invasion of privacy during an incident in her makeup trailer.
  • Both actors have faced public scrutiny and backlash amid the ongoing legal battle.
“When Ms. Lively went to fill out the privacy forms, she saw that the expert was not what Mr. Baldoni had represented her to be.”

This situation highlights long-standing issues of power dynamics and reputational damage within Hollywood.

item.title: Akshay Kumar Pens Heartfelt Note For Niece Simar Bhatia Ahead Of Her Debut In Ikkis: 'Puttar Tu Kamal Hai' - News18
item.description:
Akshay Kumar Pens Heartfelt Note For Niece Simar Bhatia Ahead Of Her Debut In Ikkis: 'Puttar Tu Kamal Hai'

Date: January 06, 2025 | Source: News18

Akshay Kumar shares a heartfelt message for his niece Simar Bhatia ahead of her Bollywood debut.

  • Simar Bhatia, daughter of Akshay's sister Alka, is making her film debut in the movie Ikkis.
  • Akshay Kumar expressed his pride and emotions in an Instagram post.
  • The film Ikkis tells a poignant story based on the 1971 Indo-Pak War.
  • Simar's role as the romantic lead opposite Agastya Nanda is highly anticipated.
  • The movie is set to premiere on January 10, 2025.
“I remember the first time I saw my photo on the cover of the newspaper... I wish my mom was here today and she would have said ‘Simar puttar tu tah Kamaal hai’. Bless you my baby, the sky is yours.”

This touching message by Akshay Kumar reflects a strong family bond and excitement for Simar's future in the film industry.

item.title: Game Changer : All decks cleared for Tamil Nadu release - 123telugu
item.description:
Game Changer: All decks cleared for Tamil Nadu release

Published on: Jan 7, 2025 12:00 am IST

Today, a few Tamil media reports stated that Lyca Productions is trying to halt the release of Game Changer. It was said that Lyca approached the Tamil Producers Council to stop Game Changer’s release in Tamil Nadu until Indian 3 is completed and released. This news disappointed Ram Charan fans heavily, as Game Changer is now the most anticipated Pongal release.

Doubts were raised about the smooth release of Game Changer in Tamil Nadu. Here is the latest update from the distributor: “All decks are cleared for the Grand Release of #GameChanger in Tamil Nadu!!! Thank you to all the film fraternity circles who extended their goodwill and support.”

Rockfort Entertainment is releasing Game Changer in Tamil Nadu, and the action drama will have the biggest release for Pongal. The majority of the theatres will be screening Game Changer in Shankar’s homeland, and bookings are expected to go live tomorrow. Kiara Advani, Anjali, SJ Suryah, Srikanth, Jayaram, Naveen Chandra, and others played vital roles.

item.title: Music Review: On 'Perverts,' Ethel Cain's gloomy Americana turns industrial - Hindustan Times
item.description:
Music Review: On 'Perverts,' Ethel Cain's gloomy Americana turns industrial

Published on: Jan 06, 2025 | Source: Hindustan Times

Ethel Cain has released her second studio album, 'Perverts,' which explores themes of self-gratification and self-loathing through a mix of post-industrial noise and haunting vocals. This album is the second part of a trilogy following her acclaimed debut, 'Preacher's Daughter.'

  • The album features darkly angelic vocals and an aggressive experimental sound.
  • Instrumentation includes unique elements like the hurdy gurdy.
  • The music blends ambient influences with slowcore elements.
  • The title track references the Titanic, setting a somber mood.
  • Despite being challenging, the album may redefine musical boundaries for Cain's audience.
“If you love me / keep it to yourself.”

This sophomore release adds depth to Cain's artistic expression, though it risks alienating some fans while pushing musical experimentation.

item.title: Why MEGA Poking Allu Arjun?.. - Greatandhra
item.description:
Why MEGA Poking Allu Arjun?

Publication Date: Not specified Source: Not specified

Allu Arjun is facing mental distress due to recent legal issues, impacting his ability to celebrate the success of 'Pushpa 2'.

  • Chiranjeevi made a remark about talent and behavior, interpreted as a jab at Allu Arjun.
  • Fans expressed that Chiranjeevi should have been more considerate in his comments.
  • Pawan Kalyan also made indirect statements perceived as pointing towards Allu Arjun.
  • The comments have sparked debate among fans regarding their implications.
“In today's sensitive climate, even generic statements can be read as personal jabs.”

This situation highlights the complexity of family dynamics and public perception in the film industry.
